text: Mad Max is a 2015 video game. It is set in an open world environment after civilization has been destroyed. It is based on the Mad Max film series. It is published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment and developed by Avalanche Studios. The game was officially revealed at E3 on June 10, 2013 during a Sony press conference. It is set to be released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360 and Xbox One in 2015. ==References== Category:2015 video games Category:Linux games Category:MacOS games Category:Open-world video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Post-apocalyptic video games Category:Single-player video games Category:Vehicular combat games Category:Video games about death games Category:Video games about police officers Category:Video games based on movies Category:Video games developed in Sweden Category:Warner Bros. video games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games
